Welcome!


ASNViz is our tool for analyzing, visualzing, interacting and exploring Animal Social Networks. Here's a brief tutorial on how to navigate our application.
In the center, you can find your chosen animal network. Nodes and edges represent animals and their social interactions.

The sidebars help you to compare nodes of the graph. By hovering your mouse over a node, you can display information about the node in the left column. Clicking on a node will show its information in the right column.
You can interact with the graph in several ways: add nodes, create edges, and predict potential connections.
The Graph Analytics page assists you in analyzing your graph. Here, you can access various metrics, statistical data, and visualizations of your graph.
As you adjust your graph, you may want to save and review your changes from time to time. You can check the Evolution tab to see how your graph has evolved over time.
If you need further assistance, don't hesitate to check out our FAQ page.
